Key Match Events: Lauri Markkanen exited Utah’s 113-96 loss to the Sacramento Kings due to a lower back spasm.
Markkanen logged 17 minutes of action against Sacramento before missing the entire second half. He finished with seven points, three rebounds, and one assist.
Post-Match Reflections: Jazz coach Will Hardy told reporters after the game that Markkanen would get treatment on Wednesday.
Hardy will wait until Thursday to determine if Markkanen is good to play.
